channel.title: Homes on Stefano Coretta
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Stefano Coretta

item.description: Welcome to the homepage of Stefano Coretta (IPA: [ˈsteˑfano koˈrɛtta]). I am a second year PhD student at the University of Manchester. I am also joint Phonetics Lab assistant (with Stephen Nichols; Director: Dr. Patrycja Strycharczuk). My area of research is linguistics with a particular focus in phonetics and phonology—the study of speech sounds and their relation with human language. I’m interested in questions like How do we produce the sounds we use in our daily communication?
